item.title: How Garth Brooks, The Killers And Tom Petty Became Stars of CFB Saturdays
item.description: Pep bands and fight songs still have their place, but now fans of some of the most prominent programs have embraced different stadium anthems.

item.title: Ex-NFL Star Antonio Brown Waives Extradition on Attempted Murder Charge
item.description: Antonio Brown will return to Florida after deciding not to contest his extradition from a New Jersey jail on an attempted murder charge.

item.title: Rams Replace Joshua Karty With Harrison 'The Thiccer Kicker' Mevis
item.description: The Los Angeles Rams are changing kickers and long snappers thanks to league-worst struggles.
